content.rendered:
Sunday Afternoon Satsang Activities

Activity of Sravana Bhakti of Shri Krishna Lilas ♦ Pravachana by Pandits, Saints & Gurus ♦ Shri Krishna Amritvani ♦ Kirtan Chants ♦ Bhajananjali ♦ Sacred Chants & Recitations ♦ GEOKC Traditional Worship Ceremony ♦ Sunday Free Preeti Bhoj

Activity of Sravana Bhakti of Shri Krishna Lilas

Hearing Divine Lilas of Lord Krishna from Bhagavat Purana with Pujya Guruji

Pravachana by Pandits, Saints & Gurus

(Created by Pandits, Sants and Gurus)

Pravachan to give the knowledge of Hinduism, spirituality, and practical living

Shri Krishna Amritvani

(Composed by Puja Guruji)

Spreading the glory of Lord Krishna

Kirtan Chants

(Sacred Chants Groups of GEOKC Kirtan Heritages)

Holy Name of Krishna, Mantras and Ragas in a group using traditional instruments used in Kirtan

Bhajananjali

(From The Divine Love Album of GEOKC Traditional Bhajans)

Group singing with a designated lead singer using traditional instruments used in Bhajans

Sacred Chants & Recitations

(A recommended practice by Pujya Guruji)

Scriptures and Bhakti Texts of Lord Krishna, Teachings of Gurus and Saints

Oral Tradition of Vedas as Recitation to Chant Vedic Mantras / Hymns:

Vedic Chants:

  • Vedas and Vedic Hymns
  • Bhagavad Gita recitation
  • Bhagavata Purana

GEOKC Traditional Worship Ceremony

GEOKC Traditional Worship Ceremonies include the following steps:

  • Offering
  • Prarthana
  • Aarti
  • Blessing
  • Holy Prasad

Sunday Free Preeti Bhoj

Coming Soon…
